DOC.brief_summary: Assess tolerability of different dosing formulations (adult versus pediatric).
DOC.brief_title: Zmax Pediatric Vs Adult Concentration For The Treatment Of Acute Otitis Media
DOC.criteria: Have clinical signs/symptoms of AOM in at least 1 ear Known or suspected hypersensitivity, or intolerance to azithromycin or other macrolides or to any penicillin, betalactam antibiotic or beta lactamase inhibitor Previously diagnosed disease(s) of immune function Treatment with any systemic (intravenous, intramuscular, oral) antibiotic for any indication within 7 days prior to enrollment
